#include <stdio.h>
#define pc putchar_unlocked
int inline inp()
{
    int n=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c < '0' || c >'9') {c=getchar_unlocked();}
    while(c>='0' && c<='9')
    {
    n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0';
    c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return n;
}
int main()
{
	int t,n;
	t=inp();
	while(t--)
	{
		n=inp();
		if(n%2==0||n%3==0)
		{	pc('Y');pc('E');pc('S');pc('\n');}
		else
		{	pc('N');pc('O');pc('\n');}
	}
	return 0;
}
